verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi prabhuke kaila nivedana
tumi nā vasile keha nā kare bhojana

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi; prabhuke—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kaila—did; nivedana—submission; tumi—You; nā vasile—if not sitting; keha—anyone; nā—not; kare—does; bhojana—eating.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī then informed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Unless You sit and take prasāda, no one will accept it.
